lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Commercial banks are in fact extremely liquid but have become highly selective in extending new credit after many companies ran into trouble repaying debt during the last three years.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Prince Khaled al-Faisal, governor of the Asir region hosting the four-day conference, accused businessmen of showing ingratitude at a time when the government had been prepared to draw heavily on reserves to maintain spending and stimulate the economy.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The pattern of the agency's lending has also shown a distinct shift away from infrastructre-related industry - such as cement plants - to capital-intensive projects.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
